heda usas wim labu heda niladharingen bahutharayak ema usas wim bara ganima sandaha andala rohalwalata me wana thek gos nathi bawa rajaye heda niladharinge sangamaya pawasayi.usas wimlabhinta andala rohalwala usas wim bara ganna lesa upades dima wenuwata gatalu athinam abhiyachana idiripath karana lesa saukhya amathyanshaya mangin upades labadimath samanga me usaswim bara noganimata ema niladharin yomuwa athayi ema sangamaye sabhapathi saman rathnapriya mahatha prakasha karayi.me usas wim pasugiyada (02) labadima sidu kala bawath lakunu pramukhathawa ha sewa awashyathawa matha niwaradiwa labadi athi bawath ee mahatha pawasayi.wasara eka hamaraka pashchath prathamika heda puhunuwa dewana wara samath heda niladharin 163 denakuta rohal sewa 1 shreniye heda niladharinta usas wim labadima sidu kara atha.

lankawa kiyana rajyaye rajya balaya 1948n pasu digatama ekthara waraprasada lath panthiyak athayi radi thibune.mema balaya udura ganima jawipe deshapalanayehi aramuna wuna.mathupitin jawipe karali therum ganna uthsaha karana kenek wisheshayen ehi thibunu deshapremi satanpata nisa eewaye aramuna wena ekak yayi nigamanaya karannata ida thibenawa.jawipe nowana,agathigami nowana wamanshika adahas darana kotas pawa(jawipe sambandha aghatha wairayakin pelena "wame"kotas noweyi) me karanaya sambandhawa prashna karanu dakiya hakiyi.
mema papol gunayen ha rasayen honda mattamaka pawathina athara wasawisa nathi palathurak lesa handunwadimata hakiwarga kirimedi wala ha waraka lesa handunwayi.
wyawastha prathisanskaranaya katayuthu pilibandawa yuddha hamuda niladharin saha sebalun danuwath karayi.
